review: I like it. It's not bad, but I prefer Apple TV.  I prefer how Apple TV integrates with all the other computers and iOS devices in my house. The bluetooth remote on this is superior, though.The interface is okay. Prime Movies work well. Netflix looks good.It's not just a stick though. It's a stick with an outlet that attaches to a cable cord. It's hard to hide on the side of a TV. We have ours plugged in directly to our Onkyo Receiver input which works well.
